projects.title: DevAlign
projects.description: DevAlign is an AI-powered Human Resource Information System (HRIS) specifically designed to revolutionize IT project allocation in Indonesia's software industry. Built to address the critical challenge of high employee turnover (20-35% annually) caused by skill-role mismatches, DevAlign leverages artificial intelligence and data analytics to match the right people with the right projects.

pages.heading: Project Overview
pages.text: DevAlign is an AI-driven Human Resource Information System (HRIS) built to transform how IT projects are staffed within Indonesia’s software industry. Addressing the industry’s high annual turnover rate of 20–35%, largely driven by mismatches between employee skills and project requirements, DevAlign uses advanced AI and data analytics to ensure the right talent is placed on the right projects. The result is smarter allocation, stronger team performance, and a more sustainable workforce.

pages.heading: The Challenge
pages.text: The wrong people are too often placed on the wrong projects, creating misalignment, stalled progress, and unnecessary frustration across teams.
list: Misaligned Skills and Roles – Employees are assigned to projects that don’t match their true capabilities.
Inefficient Use of Talent – Resources are spread thin or underutilized due to guesswork-based allocation.
Increased Turnover & Costs – Poor project fit leads to disengagement, burnout, and higher replacement expenses.

pages.heading: The Solution
pages.text: We introduced an AI-powered HRIS that intelligently matches people to projects based on real data—skills, experience, certifications, and workload—ensuring every assignment is a strategic fit.
list: AI-Generated Employee Profiles – Automatically track skills, tech stacks, certifications, achievements, and experience history.
Smart Project Matching Engine – Recommends or auto-assigns employees to projects using skill compatibility, availability, and workload balance.
Integrated Workflow Tools – Kanban boards and collaboration features streamline task visibility and team coordination.

pages.heading: Expected Impact
grid: Increased project success rates through optimal skill–project matching
Higher employee satisfaction and reduced turnover
More efficient utilization of talent and time

projects.title: Dungeon and Dragons adventure
projects.description: Dungeon and Dragons adventure is an online multiplayer D&D-style game where players create characters, join campaigns, and interact with an AI-powered Dungeon Master. Built with Next.js, Socket.IO, PostgreSQL, and Drizzle ORM, it delivers dynamic storytelling and synchronized real-time gameplay, with scalable deployment supported by Docker.

pages.heading: Project Overview
pages.text: Dungeon and Dragons Adventure is an online multiplayer D&D-style game where players create characters, join campaigns, and interact with an AI-powered Dungeon Master. Built with Next.js, Socket.IO, PostgreSQL, and Drizzle ORM, it delivers dynamic storytelling and synchronized real-time gameplay, with scalable deployment supported by Docker.

testimonial.text: This is the closest experience to having a real Dungeon Master online. The AI storytelling feels natural, the multiplayer is smooth, and every session feels unique and unpredictable.
testimonial.author: Alex Mercer

pages.heading: Key Features
list: AI-powered Dungeon Master for dynamic storytelling
Custom character creation with classes, races, and abilities
Persistent campaign data stored in PostgreSQL
Dice-roll simulation and combat encounter system
Next.js modern interface with responsive design

pages.heading: Results
grid: Real-time multiplayer syncing up to 10 players
AI Dungeon Master capable of generating branching story scenarios
Stable and successful early playtest sessions
Modular architecture ready for future expansions
